drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.desc: Build in rocks glass, muddle orange peel on the wheel, add syrup and bitters, fill glass 90% with ice pour 2 oz of Old Forester on top, splash with light soda

drinks.name: Mason Mule
drinks.desc: Build in mason jar, pour lime juice, vodka, fill with ice, top with ginger beer

drinks.name: Strawberry Daquiri
drinks.desc: Build in small tin, shake vigorously and strain
